intro:
Manga Archive Progress: 3535/23K (15%)

Browse my Hentai collection at **Alotaplot** [EN](/1G8VWDQc5fXLkRiijJB4EZerDLmDVY75MZ) [JA](/1Ar1JLs2EJyqoFuF7zzR2zsYCxMDcxBXM8) [ZH](/136euwHQt2Gm1Aj6yCsQYpyJ9NULcFTqQu) Hentai Manga & Doujinshi gallery (230+GB, 2800+). Mostly translated into English. Please download and seed!

**ManhwaHub** [EN](/126Temra5S4SmEpt1DVcxy1nhEJBhyUPvr/) Hentai Webcomics (50GB, 250+). All translated into English.

**Anthology.jp** [JA](/1ChByYBAm9S5pT7F3pckjSTb2wxTaYwGeX), my entire digital collection of Hentai magazines, neatly sorted with an all new interface! (500+GB, 5000+). Nearly all in Japanese.

**WARNING: Download speed is slow! But the more people use it the faster it will get, so spread the news!**

Want me to add a specific manga, doujinshi or magazine? Let me know!

post.body: I've uploaded nearly my entire hentai manga collection over the past two months. Seeing as I personally prefer hentai with a storyline, recurring characters (and a lot of plot),  that's the main focus of my gallery. I've also uploaded some doujinshi by favorite artists or based on non-hentai manga/anime that I like. It's called [Alotaplot](/1G8VWDQc5fXLkRiijJB4EZerDLmDVY75MZ)!

A surprising recent discovery has been [Konna Ko ni Shita no Oniichan desho!!](/1PGaLLNiadMzrmw6MMMnpZnskwFcdgZoS4/?!/g/1G8VWDQc5fXLkRiijJB4EZerDLmDVY75MZ/mori-takuya-konna-ko-ni-shita-no-oniichan-desho), even though I didn't like the art at first, I actually enjoyed several of the chapters: "Make It Rain" (there should be far more sex scenes in the rain!), the titular incest chapters and "3HS".

When I've finished adding all the manga I've downloaded over many years I will be taking a break so that my computer can seed all of the files and I can get back to having a life. I'll probably be looking for a dedicated machine to run ZeroNet on and a better internet connection. Then I'll return to a irregular rhythm of uploading new galleries whenever there's enough in my downloads folder to bother with.

Long Live ZeroNet! Long Live Hentai!
There's this old ZeroNet site called [Let's Talk About Hentai](/1J9CAuKdCxFAAgqmc1s72kpF8T1mW1SaG3/). Sadly the author appears to have left. Hopefully he comes back some day!
@NoFish: when I run `python zeronet.py sitePublish 1XXX` I get an error: `- Unhandled exception: 'FileServer' object has no attribute 'openport'`. This is with *rev3844*.

I've decided to continue what jmsebastian started: a blog about Hentai: [Alotaplot's Hentai Talk](/1KcWtJi2YSvL9DwouGymLZPKy9N6rTGXLt). I've added one post so far, but I'll be reworking it in the future. Every manga mentioned will be available on my gallery merger and links will be in the blog post. My posts probably won't be as elaborate as the original ones (they were really good, check them out at [Let's Talk About Hentai](/1J9CAuKdCxFAAgqmc1s72kpF8T1mW1SaG3)), but I'll try to keep them good quality.
I've made a [Hentai Board](/19WTvkdL8rUnAqZNtg3XaPTiDsCAcc22eB) for the Millchan Engine! (link fixed now)
I've got a big batch of hentai manga coming up. Probably about 700 in total. So Alotaplot will have 2500+ manga then. Is anyone actually using it though?

@nofish: I have some galleries from the 3D Porn Hub doubled on my old zeronet installation, but not on my python3 installation and I've been wondering why. It seems the folders have been renamed by the owner ("Strapy: Trick of the Hammer" to "Strapy; Trick of the Hammer"), and only the new one is in the content.json. Since the renaming happened before the python3 install I think it only downloaded the new one there. But on the old installation it never deleted the obsolete gallery for some reason.

Is this how it's supposed to work, or is this a bug?
What's this, you ask? I dunno... but it sure looks interesting!
Currently signing 1700+ galleries with GalleryHubPlus. Looks like this is going to take a while.
Someone has been sharing *Angel Club MEGA* issues that were missing from my collection, that someone has made me a happy man.

What I'd like to see most is scans for some of the old magazines. The *Manga Bangaichi*'s from 1995-2005, or *Lemon People* from 1982-1994, *COMIC AUN* from 1996-2003. I'm also missing so many *COMIC CanDoll*'s it makes me sad. When my Anthology site is up and running I'll start indexing everything I'm missing.
Added another 200+ issues to my hub this weekend. It was mostly from *COMIC Sigma*, *COMIC Pot* and *COMIC Potpourri Club*. Only a couple of thousands left to go!
COMIC BAVEL SPECIAL COLLECTION Vol.4 (p.27)

Anthology now has 3875 volumes of Japanese hentai magazines.

I've been looking for some JAV material with a particular fetish of mine: girls collecting condoms. To my surprise I can barely find any, even though this is common in hentai.
These are the only ones I've been able to find:
- RCT-589, 712, 839, 959 "Tanned Gal Bitches Ejaculation Management" (Vol.1-4)
- RCTD-249 "New Dark Gal Bitch Edging Kaho Imai"

Manhwa takedowns really seem to have gone into overdrive, I'm not a big fan of them myself, but since there's that many of them I've made a new gallery hub for English Manhwa translations: [ManhwaHub EN](/126Temra5S4SmEpt1DVcxy1nhEJBhyUPvr/).

If the web comic is still incomplete or ongoing this will be marked in the title and in the tags (add !:incomplete to your filter to exclude these).

Finally finished uploading my entire collection of English translated hentai tankoubons at [Alotaplot EN](/1G8VWDQc5fXLkRiijJB4EZerDLmDVY75MZ). There's about 2200 of them!

Enjoy!

I've uploaded some hentai Manhwas recently, surpassing the 250 mark! Here's some recommendations:
- [Solmi's Channel](http://localhost:43111/1PGaLLNiadMzrmw6MMMnpZnskwFcdgZoS4/?!/g/126Temra5S4SmEpt1DVcxy1nhEJBhyUPvr/dabble_solmis-channel_EN)
- [Teach Me How To Please You](http://localhost:43111/1PGaLLNiadMzrmw6MMMnpZnskwFcdgZoS4/?!/g/126Temra5S4SmEpt1DVcxy1nhEJBhyUPvr/soso_teach-me-how-to-please-you_EN)

Now hosting **374** Manhwas (R18) on [ManhwaHub EN](/126Temra5S4SmEpt1DVcxy1nhEJBhyUPvr), all translated to English.

With this we are surpassing some of the best known free manhwa hosting sites on the clearnet!
- Readmanhwa: 373
- Webtoon.xyz: 355
- Hiperdex: 351
- Manhwa18: 320
- ManhwaClub: 295
- Mangadex: 267
- Mangazuki.me: 179
- Toonily: 166
- Manhwamanga: 73

*These are based on a search on the "Adult" tag, or whatever the sites equivalent to that tag is.*

And hopefully catchin up with other like ManhwaSmut soon.

Spread the word!

comment.body: Hey, nice to see someone else is also adding galleries! I have over 1k in my hub now, so we should start thinking about getting the word out to the wider hentai community.
@Loligod: thank you :-) I'll be adding some more soon.
@Loligod: that's new, I'm not having that problem on my end. @1pgallery: @NoFish:? Also when did it happen?
@Loligod: I don't think it has to do with the size of the gallery as such, too many SQL variables should have to do with a query, but I don't see how a bigger gallery would result in a bigger query
@Pexo: nice collection, did pomfpomf ban loli? i know a lot of clearnet sites are sadly going that direction.
@Pexo: that's even more sad. But it's also inevitable, as long as sites keep using centralized hosting they will eventually disappear from the internet.

@Quantumworld: why do you even want that?

@nekololi: I hope you stick around! A lot of things will be coming to ZeroNet I think.
@Nofish: great to hear!
@ssdifnskdjfnsdjk@zeroid.bit: right [this link](/19WTvkdL8rUnAqZNtg3XaPTiDsCAcc22eB) is the right one then.
@ivxvm: right you are!
I don't, but that's probably because I'm posting 2d porn on ZeroNet :-p
What instance?
@klu9@zeroid.bit: that's a good read, will still check out mastodon but wish the artists would really decentralize
@nofish: Signing failed after a while because the default size limit of 10MB was too small, shouldn't that limit be ignored for owned sites?
Kay, signing is done, testing if everything works with a second zeronet instance.
150TB makes my measly 0.4TB look like peanuts. There's quite a bit of duplicates in there probably, but still. That's a crazy amount. I don't think ZeroNet can even handle anywhere near that rn.
I have not tried it on api, but on my computer py3 has been doing well.

Maybe this means people will finally wake up to why we need to decentralize? I hope all the lost souls are hearing about places like ZeroNet now, but I'm afraid they'll just gather around another centralized server and then another and another...
@😍Leinariys😎: Glad to hear it! Yes, I use Tor-only mode.
[relevant ZeroFun meme](http://127.0.0.1:43111/1ZGagD38ypjSoUrpNEGaPFmAMKFcdud7C/?post=17ArNJgy6YwDKjMSsnx1es2ie5jLHJbD9P_1568832253391)
Tor browser, but it's working already so thanks.
Should be back online now.
@ssdifnskdjfnsdjk@zeroid.bit: Yes, both Alotaplot and Anthology are on there.
@ssdifnskdjfnsdjk@zeroid.bit: I was on holiday, and mabe nobody downloaded it? Seeding server is back online now.
I'm a mission to test the uttermost limits of ZeroNet, my 3 zites combined probably host 3 to 4 million optional files.
Hello!
@nekololi: Glad you like it! Plenty more untranslated works to come, estimated at 20k. I'm having some server problems so there may be downtimes if nobody mirrored everything yet.
Correction: we surpassed ManhwaSmut already, they cheated by adding mangas, filtering those out they only have some 200 webtoons available.
